game.name: CYBERVOID
game.shortDescription: Cybervoid is a sci-fi point-and-click RPG adventure. Sent on a mysterious mission, will you follow orders or forge your own path? Manage your time and energy wisely exploring a city on the edge of salvation or ruin and in doing so, ultimately discover your connection to this city and its fate.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cybervoid is a sci-fi point-and-click RPG adventure. Sent on a mysterious mission, will you follow orders or forge your own path? Manage your time and energy wisely exploring a city on the edge of salvation or ruin and in doing so, ultimately discover your connection to this city and its fate.
